title: Fig, cream cheese and mint tart
description: This recipe is a real stunner and a snappy one to prepare. Serve with a simple rocket or spinach salad and a glass of a sweet wine such as Asti.Equipment and preparation: You will need a 20 x 30cm/8 x 12in rectangular fluted tin.
ingredients: handful green shelled pistachios, walnuts or pecans, halved
1 bunch fresh mint, ripped or roughly torn
